properties.areaDesc: Richland, SC; Calhoun, SC; Lexington, SC
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 2:39PM EST until January 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the
following rivers in South Carolina...
Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun...Lexington
and Richland Counties

.Heavy rainfall over the past 2 days combined with upstream
reservoir releases will cause minor to moderate flooding along
the Congaree River downstream from Columbia. Additional rainfall
amounts of up to 1 inch are expected over the next couple of
days. Heavier rainfall amounts of up to 2 inches are expected
in the Upstate and upper portion of the Saluda and Broad River
basins. This will produce flooding along Congaree River for the
next several days.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The
water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to
play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to noaa weather radio...
local media or the internet for further statements and updated
forecasts.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from Minor to Moderate severity
